oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive
Interface AbstractCSB.CombinedPredictionModel

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCSB.MinimumExpectedCostCriterion, AbstractCSB.MinimumExpectedCostCriterionUsingConfidenceLevels, AbstractCSB.MaximumVoteCriterion, AbstractCSB.MaximumVoteCriterionUsingConfidenceLevels
Enclosing class:
AbstractCSB
private static interface AbstractCSB.CombinedPredictionModel
extends java.io.Serializable

Interface for the internal classes that will serve to configure how the base classifiers will be combined to obtain the final hypothesis for a given instance.
